room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by EDscapade Games in San Jose
room_description: You and your friends have been kidnapped by the Hostel Hatchet - a sick serial killer who tortures the unworthy with a ratchet. He created a sadistic game that tests his victims' will to survive. Those who are worthy live to tell the tale. Those who fail to escape are cleaved and sold to the black market. Face your fears as you embrace the darkness and use your wits to escape the ultimate doom!
